name: trending_app
description: A vanilla TypeScript single-page app with a Vercel serverless backend.

scripts.start: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && npm run format && npm run dev && npm run build
scripts.dev:vercel: rimraf .vercel/output .vercel/builders && npx vercel dev --debug --cwd C:\docker\trending_app --local-config C:\docker\trending_app\vercel.json
scripts.build: tsc --project api/tsconfig.json && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix client ci || npm --prefix client i
scripts.typecheck: tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p client/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p api/tsconfig.json --noEmit
